content.description: Follow the bolts up the west face of the spire.  The moves are soft sporty mantles and bulges.  Its well enough protected.  Lower off a three bolt chain anchor.  If you desire to take the true summit, climb an extra 7 feet then downclimb back to the anchor.
content.protection: Five bolts to a three bolt chain anchor.  I know the bolts are sturdy because I watched a guy named Durf take a 15 footer on this short route and the bolt held.
content.location: If you drive up the drainage road east of the Cedar City golf course, you will see this spire on the south (right) side of the road.  IT IS THE ONLY SPIRE IN THE AREA so you will know it when you see it. The approach is about a 4 minute walk.
